author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: إشارات المعرضين لو یحلّ ما حرّم في أزل الآزال أو بالعکس ليس لأحد أن يعترض عليه والّذي توقّف في أقلّ من آنٍ إنّه من المعتدين والّذي
translation: Were He to decree as lawful the thing which from time immemorial had been forbidden, and forbid that which had, at all times, been regarded as lawful, to none is given the right to question His authority. Whoso will hesitate, though it be for less than a moment, should be regarded as a transgressor.
